comment: Default list of template files to exclude from testing and prompt generation. To modify the default exclude list, edit the 'exclude_list' array below. This list is loaded by scripts/test/test-all-templates.py and CC/scripts/prompt-all-templates.py

exclude_list.name: Final Fantasy.yaml
exclude_list.reason: Requires manual configuration and is not compatible with automated testing

exclude_list.name: Secret of Evermore.yaml
exclude_list.reason: Uses an external tool (pyevermizer) for its logic and is not compatible with automated testing

exclude_list.name: Sudoku.yaml
exclude_list.reason: Cannot be used for generating worlds
